# Alex Ruiz - Senior Software Engineer Portfolio

## About
Alex Ruiz is a Senior Software Engineer based in Barcelona, Spain, and Bonn, Germany. He has over 4 years of experience in the tech industry, specializing in Full-Stack Development, Software Architecture, DevOps, and Technical Leadership. He holds a dual degree in Computer Engineering and Video Game Production.

## Core Skills
- **Languages:** TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, Kotlin, Python, C#
- **Front-end:** React, Angular, Vue, HTML5, CSS3, jQuery
- **Back-end:** Spring Boot, Node.js, Flask, Django, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
- **DevOps:** Git, GitHub, GitLab, Docker, Jenkins, Elastic Stack
- **AI & Tools:** OpenRouter, GitHub Copilot, LLMs, Figma
- **Testing:** JUnit, Jest, Pytest
- **Game Dev:** Unity, C#, Game Architecture

## Experience
- **Senior Software Engineer** at NTT DATA Europe & Latam (Jul 2024 - Present)
- **Mid-Level Software Engineer** at NTT DATA Europe & Latam (Jul 2023 - Jun 2024)
- **Junior Software Engineer** at NTT DATA Europe & Latam (Apr 2022 - Jun 2023)

## Projects
- **GAIDGG:** Generative AI-Driven Game Generation.
- **SODD Framework:** ScriptableObject Driven Development framework for Unity.
- **Heist Academy:** A puzzle and stealth 3D game.
